summary: Completed testing of Location Picker, Mobile All Dropdown, and Feature Settings integration. Backend APIs 100% working. Frontend features verified with some observations.

minor.issue: Dodoma region appears twice in the list

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile location picker button in header is visible but not clickable - missing data-testid='location-picker-mobile' on rendered element
ui_bugs.selector: location icon in mobile category header

issues: Prices display in EUR (â‚¬) on homepage but TSh on category page - inconsistent currency formatting based on where listing currency was stored

action_items: Verify mobile location picker button is rendering with correct onPress handler and data-testid
Consider enforcing TSh currency display regardless of stored listing currency (use feature settings)
critical_code_review_comments: Location picker implementation looks correct in category/[id].tsx but mobile view rendering may have different component path
MobileHeader All dropdown is working after server restart - may need to verify hot reload is working correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs all passing. Location picker works on desktop category page. Mobile All dropdown works after expo restart. Mobile location picker button needs verification.

features_verified.location_picker_desktop_opens_modal: PASS - Modal opens with Tanzania regions
features_verified.location_picker_filters_listings: PASS - Selecting Dar es Salaam filtered to 0 listings
features_verified.location_picker_clear_button: PASS - Clear button visible and works
features_verified.mobile_all_dropdown_shows_modal: PASS - After expo restart, modal opens with category list
features_verified.mobile_all_dropdown_category_selection: PASS - Selecting category opens subcategory modal
features_verified.feature_settings_api: PASS - Returns correct TZS currency, show_view_count, show_time_ago, show_featured_badge
features_verified.listing_card_view_count: PASS - View counts visible on listing cards
features_verified.listing_card_time_posted: PASS - Time posted (4d ago, 5d ago) visible
features_verified.listing_card_price_tzs: PARTIAL - TSh prefix showing on category page, EUR on homepage
features_verified.featured_badge_visibility: PASS - TOP badge visible on featured listings
